item.title: Intellij Shortcuts
item.description: Note: This is a living document and will be updated as I discover new things. Shortcuts Ctrl + Shift + A Find any action in IDE Ctrl + Shift + F Find in Path Alt + 1 Open project navigator. You can search here, just start typing here, after the project navigator window is opened. Shift + Insert in Project window Here you can add new file to the project. The filename could be the entire path, so the intermediate directories will be created for you.
